mapper.sql: ID, PJSLSC, PJSPSC, PJBJSC, PJFDSX, PJBJSX, TQBJL, ZBJL, XSBJL, XXBJL, QHBM, QHMC, BMBM, BMMC, TJYF, GXSJ
mapper.insert: insert into T_ZHJC_YX_MYBJ (ID, PJSLSC, PJSPSC, PJBJSC, PJFDSX, PJBJSX, TQBJL, ZBJL, XSBJL, XXBJL, QHBM, QHMC, BMBM, BMMC, TJYF, GXSJ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pjslsc,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pjspsc,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pjbjsc,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pjfdsx,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pjbjsx,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{tqbjl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{zbjl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{xsbjl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{xxbjl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{qhbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qhmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bmbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bmmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tjyf,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gxsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into T_ZHJC_YX_MYBJ
ID,
PJSLSC,
PJSPSC,
PJBJSC,
PJFDSX,
PJBJSX,
TQBJL,
ZBJL,
XSBJL,
XXBJL,
QHBM,
QHMC,
BMBM,
BMMC,
TJYF,
GXSJ,

#{pjslsc,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{pjspsc,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{pjbjsc,jdbcType=NUMERIC},

#{pjbjsx,jdbcType=NUMERIC},

mapper.update:
update T_ZHJC_YX_MYBJ
PJSLSC = #{pjslsc,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
PJSPSC = #{pjspsc,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
PJBJSC = #{pjbjsc,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
PJFDSX = #{pjfdsx,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
PJBJSX = #{pjbjsx,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
TQBJL = #{tqbjl,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ZBJL = #{zbjl,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
XSBJL = #{xsbjl,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
XXBJL = #{xxbjl,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
QHBM = #{qhbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QHMC = #{qhmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BMBM = #{bmbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BMMC = #{bmmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TJYF = #{tjyf,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
GXSJ = #{gxsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_ZHJC_YX_MYBJ set PJSLSC = #{pjslsc,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PJSPSC = #{pjspsc,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PJBJSC = #{pjbjsc,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PJFDSX = #{pjfdsx,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PJBJSX = #{pjbjsx,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, TQBJL = #{tqbjl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ZBJL = #{zbjl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, XSBJL = #{xsbjl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, XXBJL = #{xxbjl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, QHBM = #{qhbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QHMC = #{qhmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BMBM = #{bmbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BMMC = #{bmmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TJYF = #{tjyf,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GXSJ = #{gxsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT nvl(bjsc,0)as bjsc, nvl(zbl,0 )as bjl from ( SELECT avg(nvl(PJSLSC,0))as slsc,avg(nvl(PJBJSC,0))as bjsc,sum(nvl(ZBJL,0))as zbl from T_ZHJC_YX_MYBJ where TJYF like CONCAT(#{month},'%'))

SELECT nvl(tqbjl,0)as tqbjl, nvl(zbl,0)as zbjl, nvl(xsbjl,0)as xsbjl, nvl(xxbjl,0)as xxbjl from ( SELECT sum(nvl(TQBJL,0))as tqbjl,sum(nvl(ZBJL,0))as zbl,sum(nvl(XXBJL,0))as xxbjl,sum(nvl(XSBJL,0))as xsbjl from T_ZHJC_YX_MYBJ where TJYF like CONCAT(#{month},'%'))
